title: user authentication via clerk
description: Test the user authentication endpoints to ensure secure sign-up, sign-in, and session management using Clerk authentication system without errors.

title: instagram account integration oauth flow
description: Verify the Instagram account integration process including OAuth account connection, token management, profile data syncing, and webhook subscription setup.

title: automation creation and trigger execution
description: Test creating comment and DM automations with keyword triggers and verify that MESSAGE and SMARTAI listener responses are executed correctly upon matching triggers.

title: webhook event handling and processing
description: Validate the webhook handler endpoint to ensure it correctly validates incoming Instagram events, processes them without delay or failure, triggers automations, and returns proper status codes.

title: dashboard metrics and automation status display
description: Verify that the dashboard UI displays accurate real-time or near-real-time metrics and automation statuses reflecting the current system state.

title: subscription upgrade and stripe payment processing
description: Test the subscription upgrade flow from Free to Pro plan including Stripe checkout, payment confirmation, and access to advanced SMARTAI features.

title: data fetching and caching with react query
description: Ensure that data fetching hooks use React Query caching effectively to optimize performance and minimize unnecessary network calls.

title: ui components rendering and theme toggling
description: Test that UI components render correctly with consistent styling and responsive behavior, including the dark/light theme toggle functionality.

title: error handling and user friendly messages
description: Verify that error handling mechanisms capture and log errors without crashing the app and display clear, helpful user-facing error messages.

title: end to end user flows
description: Test all key user flows including onboarding, automation creation, and subscription upgrade to ensure they complete successfully without functional bugs.
